definitions.definition: the light, soft bark (= outer covering) of a Mediterranean tree
a short, cylinder-shaped piece of cork, plastic, or rubber that is put into the top of a bottle, especially a wine bottle, to close it:
examples: I can't get the cork out of the bottle - can you try?

definitions.definition: to close a bottle by putting a cork in it:
examples: I'll cork the bottle and we can drink the rest later.
